fact: Zhanghao was born on July 25, 2000 in Fujian, China
He can speak 3 languages: Mandarin Chinese, English and Korean
He studied in the Department of Music Education and graduated from Fujian Normal University.
He initially studied science at the China University of Geology in 2017, but later he tried to get into the music department at Fujian Normal University. He got first place in the entire region.
He can play violin, piano, viola and cello
He has poor eyesight, so he usually wears glasses
His solo fandom name is Rosin
Zhang Hao is the first foreign member to be a center of (ZB1) in the history of the Mnet’s survival show “BOYS PLANET”.
He ranked first and won the final round in BOYS PLANET with 1,998,154 votes.
Zhang Hao is the first foreign member to be a center of (ZB1) in the history of the Mnet’s survival show “BOYS PLANET”.
He is signed under Yuehua Entertainment.
He trained for 1 year prior to the competition.
ZEROBASEONE (제로베이스원), also known as simply ZB1, is a 9-member project group formed by MNET‘s survival show BOYS PLANET.
The group consists of Sung Han Bin, Kim Ji Woong, Zhang Hao, Seok Matthew, Kim Tae Rae, Ricky, Kim Gyu Vin, Park Gun Wook, and Han Yu Jin.
They are managed by WAKEONE Entertainment and their contract will last for two years and a half.
They made their debut on July 10, 2023 with the mini album, ‘YOUTH IN THE SHADE‘.
Best New Overseas Artist – “YOUTH IN THE SHADE
Viaje Global Popularity Award Zhang Hao
